statements: DELETE FROM customer_notifications WHERE customer_id = 123 AND notification_type = 'promotion';
DELETE FROM customer_notifications WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM customer_notifications WHERE notification_text LIKE '%urgent%');
DELETE FROM CustomerNotifications WHERE customer_id = 123 AND notification_type = 'Special'
DELETE FROM CustomerNotifications WHERE trigger_event = 'New Product'
DELETE FROM customer_notifications WHERE customer_id = 123 AND trigger_event = 'payment';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE customer_id = 3 AND event_id = 4
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_date < CURRENT_DATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE notification_sent = TRUE;
